title: General tab always tries to open next to the Connections tab
author: codearoo
body_snippet:
Ver 1.75.7008.17907 on Windows 10.

Hi..  I have used mRemoteNG for years.. and just recently updated. Now I have this strange problem. When I open it up, and open an RDP in my connections tab, it always opens the General tab next to it, inside that little area. I always have to then move the General tab onto the larger section of my screen. I've tried saving everything (don't see a "save panel layout" option) and next time I close and re-open mRemoteNG it's the same story.

iterations.description: Issue is vague with no reproducible steps, the reporter confirmed the suggested fix didn't work but provided no further details, and our triage comment requesting retest/logs/screenshots has not been answered

comments.author: pedro2555
comments.snippet: Backup and delete `%AppData%\Roaming\mRemoteNG\pnlLayout.xml`, and report if it fixes it.

comments.author: codearoo
comments.snippet:
Hmm. That worked. Thank you.
a bug fix though?
